original_text: And it came to pass, that when the Jews which dwelt by them came, they said unto us ten times, From all places whence ye shall return unto us they will be upon you.
korean_text: 그 원수들의 근처에 거주하는 유다 사람들도 그 각처에서 와서 열 번이나 우리에게 말하기를 너희가 우리에게로 와야 하리라 하기로

sentences.original_text: that when the Jews which dwelt by them came
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 옆에 사는 유대인들이 왔을 때

sentences.original_text: they said unto us ten times
From all places whence ye shall return unto us
